question.title: Reactor Netty shutdown not processing remaining requests (executor not accepting a task)
question.body:
I got a Java Spring Boot 3 reactive application and I found that, when the servers are being shutdown gracefully, some of the remaining requests (making external calls using WebClient) are failing due to exception:

IllegalStateException: executor not accepting a task

This exception seems to come from Netty and is thrown if executor.isShuttingDown().

Is there a way to make the application wait gracefully for all the existing Reactive requests to be completed before shutting down Netty?
